TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit Comparer extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.IComparer, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public NotInheritable Class Comparer Implements IComparer, ISerializable
public ref class Comparer sealed : System::Collections::IComparer, System::Runtime::Serialization::ISerializable

summary.span: 比较两个对象是否相等，其中字符串比较是区分大小写的。

span.span: Compares two objects for equivalence, where string comparisons are case-sensitive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类是的默认实现接口。This class is the default implementation of the interface. 类是实现执行不区分大小写的字符串比较的接口。The class is the implementation of the interface that performs case-insensitive string comparisons. 比较过程使用的当前线程除非另行指定。Comparison procedures use the of the current thread unless otherwise specified. 字符串比较可能会有不同的结果，根据区域性。String comparisons might have different results depending on the culture. 有关特定于区域性的比较的详细信息，请参阅命名空间和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9a59696b-d89b-45bd-946d-c75da4732d02)。For more information on culture-specific comparisons, see the namespace and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9a59696b-d89b-45bd-946d-c75da4732d02). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何返回不同的值，具体取决于与关联的区域性。The following code example shows how returns different values depending on the culture associated with the . [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Comparer#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Comparer/CPP/comparercultures.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Comparer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Comparer/CS/comparercultures.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Comparer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Comparer/VB/comparercultures.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用指定的比较过程来确定排序顺序和大小写规则。Comparison procedures use the specified to determine the sort order and casing rules. 字符串比较可能会有不同的结果，根据区域性。String comparisons might have different results depending on the culture. 有关特定于区域性的比较的详细信息，请参阅命名空间和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9a59696b-d89b-45bd-946d-c75da4732d02)。For more information on culture-specific comparisons, see the namespace and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9a59696b-d89b-45bd-946d-c75da4732d02). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何返回不同的值，具体取决于与关联的区域性。The following code example shows how returns different values depending on the culture associated with the . summary.span: 对同一类型的两个对象执行区分大小写的比较，并返回一个值，指示其中一个对象小于、等于还是大于另一个对象。

span.span: Performs a case-sensitive comparison of two objects of the same type and returns a value indicating whether one is less than, equal to, or greater than the other.

returns.span: 一个有符号整数，指示 和 的相对值，如下表所示。

span.span: A signed integer that indicates the relative values of and , as shown in the following table.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`a`实现，然后`a`。If `a` implements , then `a`. `CompareTo` (`b`) 返回; 否则为如果`b`实现，然后求反后的结果`b`。`CompareTo` (`b`) is returned; otherwise, if `b` implements , then the negated result of `b`. `CompareTo` (`a`) 返回。`CompareTo` (`a`) is returned. 比较`null`允许与任何类型和使用时不会生成异常。Comparing `null` with any type is allowed and does not generate an exception when using . 在排序时，`null`被视为小于任何其他对象。When sorting, `null` is considered to be less than any other object. 字符串比较可能会有不同的结果，根据区域性。String comparisons might have different results depending on the culture. 有关特定于区域性的比较的详细信息，请参阅命名空间和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9a59696b-d89b-45bd-946d-c75da4732d02)。For more information on culture-specific comparisons, see the namespace and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9a59696b-d89b-45bd-946d-c75da4732d02). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何返回不同的值，具体取决于与关联的区域性。The following code example shows how returns different values depending on the culture associated with the . remarks.format: ## Remarks 虽然方法不是对默认情况下，COM 客户端可见继承类可以公开它，并且可以在 COM 客户端导致意外行为。While the method is not visible to COM clients by default, inheriting the class can expose it and can cause undesirable behavior in COM clients.
